name: Exam Module workspace
description: This workspace documents the architecture of the Exam Module which enables teachers to create, manage exam dates and notify students about them, while the students can obtain information and enroll to said exams.

people.name: Student
people.description: Enroll to exams and gets notified about them

people.name: Teacher
people.description: Responsible for creating and administrating exams

softwareSystems.name: Exam System
softwareSystems.description: Enables to create, enroll and evaluate exams.

containers.name: Exams and Students database
containers.description: Serves as a centralized component for storing exam-related data.

containers.name: Teacher Dashboard
containers.description: Provides functionalities for exam creation and management for the teacher in a web browser

containers.name: Subject Provider
containers.description: Allows the possibility to check subjects one is attributed to

components.name: Subject Request Handler
components.description: Handles requests from the api gateway and forwards them to the subject controller

relationships.description: Forwards request to recieve list of subjects

components.name: Subject Controller
components.description: Allows overview and management of instructed or enrolled subjects

relationships.description: Issues commands or requests data from

components.name: Subject Repository
components.description: Serves as a centralized component for retrieving subject-related data

containers.name: Student Dashboard
containers.description: Provides functionalities for enrollment and other student releted tasks in a web browser

components.name: Exam Request Handler
components.description: Handles requests from the api gateway and forwards them to the exam controller

relationships.description: Forwards request to enroll and get information about exams

components.name: Exam Repository
components.description: Serves as a centralized component for retrieving exam-related data.

components.name: Notification Manager
components.description: Provides an interface for sending notifications to students

components.name: Enrollment Controller
components.description: Is responsible for student enrollment processes, retrieves and stores relevant exam information.

relationships.description: Initiates the email sending about enrollment confirmation

components.name: Schedule Controller
components.description: Manages scheduling-related operations, such as creating, updating, and deleting exams.

relationships.description: Initiates the email sending about scheduled exams

components.name: Prerequisite Validator
components.description: Ensures that students meet necessary requirements before enrolling in specific exams.

relationships.description: Initiates the email sending about graded exams

containers.name: API Gateway
containers.description: Provides a unified interface for the frontend applications to communicate with the backend services.

containers.name: Teacher App
containers.description: Provides a dashboard to the teachers and allows them to create and manage exams.

containers.name: Student Activity Provider
containers.description: Provides information about current status of student

components.name: Activity Repository
components.description: Serves as a centralized component for retrieving student-related data.

components.name: Activity Controller
components.description: Allows overview and management of students' status

relationships.description: Issues commands or requests data from

components.name: Activity Request Handler
components.description: Handles requests from the api gateway and forwards them to the activity controller

relationships.description: Forwards request to get information about student activity

containers.name: Student App
containers.description: Provides a dashboard to the students and allows them to enroll to exams and get notified about them.

softwareSystems.name: Mail Server
softwareSystems.description: Sends notifications to students about exams.

softwareSystems.name: University Scheduling System
softwareSystems.description: Provides the necessary data to locate exams.
